statements.statement: select * from TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC order by CHAMSOC_ID

select * from TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CHAMSOC_ID = '$CHAMSOC_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGAYTHUCHIEN = '$NGAYTHUCHIEN$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.THOIGIANTHUCHIEN = '$THOIGIANTHUCHIEN$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID = '$NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.MACH = '$MACH$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NHIETDO = '$NHIETDO$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.HUYETAPTHAP = '$HUYETAPTHAP$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.HUYETAPCAO = '$HUYETAPCAO$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CANNANG = '$CANNANG$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NHIPTHO = '$NHIPTHO$'

TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.DIENBENH = '$DIENBENH$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.YLENHCHAMSOC = '$YLENHCHAMSOC$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CHANDOANDIEUDUONG = '$CHANDOANDIEUDUONG$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.LUONGGIA = '$LUONGGIA$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.UONG = '$UONG$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.AN = '$AN$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.TIEMTRUYEN = '$TIEMTRUYEN$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.TRUYENMAU = '$TRUYENMAU$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NON = '$NON$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.DANLUU = '$DANLUU$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.DICHDANLUU1 = '$DICHDANLUU1$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.DICHDANLUU2 = '$DICHDANLUU2$'

TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
order by CHAMSOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC where TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CHAMSOC_ID = '$value$' order by CHAMSOC_ID
select * from TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC where TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CHAMSOC_ID = '$CHAMSOC_ID$' order by CHAMSOC_ID
statements.insert:
select TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC ( CHAMSOC_ID , BENHAN_ID , LUUTRU_ID , DOITUONG_ID , NGAYTHUCHIEN , THOIGIANTHUCHIEN , NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID , MACH , NHIETDO , HUYETAPTHAP , HUYETAPCAO , CANNANG , NHIPTHO , MUCDODAU , CHIEUCAO , SPO2 , NUOCTIEU , PHAN , DIENBENH , YLENHCHAMSOC , CHANDOANDIEUDUONG , LUONGGIA , UONG , AN , TIEMTRUYEN , TRUYENMAU , NON , DANLUU , DICHDANLUU1 , DICHDANLUU2 , GHICHU , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #LUUTRU_ID# , #DOITUONG_ID# , #NGAYTHUCHIEN# , #THOIGIANTHUCHIEN# , #NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID# , #MACH# , #NHIETDO# , #HUYETAPTHAP# , #HUYETAPCAO# , #CANNANG# , #NHIPTHO# , #MUCDODAU# , #CHIEUCAO# , #SPO2# , #NUOCTIEU# , #PHAN# , #DIENBENH# , #YLENHCHAMSOC# , #CHANDOANDIEUDUONG# , #LUONGGIA# , #UONG# , #AN# , #TIEMTRUYEN# , #TRUYENMAU# , #NON# , #DANLUU# , #DICHDANLUU1# , #DICHDANLUU2# , #GHICHU# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC set BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID# , DOITUONG_ID = #DOITUONG_ID# , NGAYTHUCHIEN = #NGAYTHUCHIEN# , THOIGIANTHUCHIEN = #THOIGIANTHUCHIEN# , NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID = #NGUOITHUCHIEN_ID# , MACH = #MACH# , NHIETDO = #NHIETDO# , HUYETAPTHAP = #HUYETAPTHAP# , HUYETAPCAO = #HUYETAPCAO# , CANNANG = #CANNANG# , NHIPTHO = #NHIPTHO# , MUCDODAU = #MUCDODAU# , CHIEUCAO = #CHIEUCAO# , SPO2 = #SPO2# , NUOCTIEU = #NUOCTIEU# , PHAN = #PHAN# , DIENBENH = #DIENBENH# , YLENHCHAMSOC = #YLENHCHAMSOC# , CHANDOANDIEUDUONG = #CHANDOANDIEUDUONG# , LUONGGIA = #LUONGGIA# , UONG = #UONG# , AN = #AN# , TIEMTRUYEN = #TIEMTRUYEN# , TRUYENMAU = #TRUYENMAU# , NON = #NON# , DANLUU = #DANLUU# , DICHDANLUU1 = #DICHDANLUU1# , DICHDANLUU2 = #DICHDANLUU2# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where CHAMSOC_ID = '$CHAMSOC_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.CHAMSOC_ID = '$CHAMSOC_ID$'
TT_NOITRU_CHAMSOC.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
